page.title: 13Brenchley Forge.
page.content: Brenchley Forge,thought to be{100 } years old,has had{4}owners,anything made by the 1st has{F.H.B.}imprinted on it.The 2nd owner was there until the end of World War II.My father, after training at{Leigh Forge}and working at{Horsmonden,}is now the present owner.{ { Blacksmiths}do{general repairs}and make{wrought iron work.}The protective clothes they wear while welding include:goggles,apron and steel capped shoes.A fire burns a mixture of coal and coke.The machinery used includes an electric forge and in addition tools such as hammers,anvil,welders and drills. My father employs{1}person who lives {locally}like himself.They start work at{8.00}and finish at{5.00.}They both like their work and would not like to work in a town or city.
